# Read in cleaned csv file
```{r}
cleandata <- read.csv("clean_2013.csv")
head(cleandata)
```

# Find relationship between completion within 4 years at original institution and Gender of student
```{r}
female <- as.numeric(cleandata$FEMALE_COMP_ORIG_YR4_RT)
male <- as.numeric(cleandata$MALE_COMP_ORIG_YR4_RT)
newdata <- na.omit(data.frame(female,male))
plot(newdata$female, newdata$male) 



lm.fit <- lm(newdata$female ~ newdata$male)
summary(lm.fit)
plot(lm.fit)



MEAN <- c(mean(as.numeric(cleandata$MALE_COMP_ORIG_YR4_RT),na.rm=TRUE), mean(as.numeric(cleandata$FEMALE_COMP_ORIG_YR4_RT),na.rm=TRUE)) 

STD <- c(sd(as.numeric(cleandata$MALE_COMP_ORIG_YR4_RT),na.rm=TRUE), sd(as.numeric(cleandata$FEMALE_COMP_ORIG_YR4_RT),na.rm=TRUE)) 

MEDIAN <- c(median(as.numeric(cleandata$MALE_COMP_ORIG_YR4_RT),na.rm=TRUE), median(as.numeric(cleandata$FEMALE_COMP_ORIG_YR4_RT),na.rm=TRUE)) 

mydata <- data.frame(MEAN, STD, MEDIAN)
row.names(mydata) <- c("male","female")
mydata


```

# Compare ncf and other colleges
```{r}
ncf <- cleandata[cleandata$INSTNM == "New College of Florida",]
#Percent of all undergraduate students receiving a federal student loan
PCTFLOAN <- c(ncf$PCTFLOAN, mean(as.numeric(cleandata$PCTFLOAN),na.rm=TRUE)) 
#Percentage of undergraduates aged 25 and above
UG25ABV <- c(ncf$UG25ABV, mean(as.numeric(cleandata$UG25ABV),na.rm=TRUE))
#Share of female students
FEMALE <- c(ncf$FEMALE, mean(as.numeric(cleandata$FEMALE),na.rm=TRUE))
#Share of married students
MARRIED <- c(ncf$MARRIED, mean(as.numeric(cleandata$MARRIED),na.rm=TRUE))
#Average family income in real 2015 dollars
FAMINC <- c(ncf$FAMINC, mean(as.numeric(cleandata$FAMINC),na.rm=TRUE))
#Mean earnings of students working and not enrolled 8 years after entry
MNEARN8 <- c(ncf$MN_EARN_WNE_P8, mean(as.numeric(cleandata$MN_EARN_WNE_P8),na.rm=TRUE))
#Share of students earning over $25,000/year (threshold earnings) 8 years after entry
GT25K <- c(ncf$GT_25K_P8, mean(as.numeric(cleandata$GT_25K_P8),na.rm=TRUE))


df <- data.frame(PCTFLOAN,UG25ABV,FEMALE,MARRIED,FAMINC, MNEARN8, GT25K)
row.names(df) <- c("ncf","others")
df

```
